sent.orig: Remy: Yeah, anyone can cook. That doesn't mean anyone should.
sent.trans: 雷米：耶，人人都能当厨师，并不意味著人人都应该当厨师。

sent.orig: I do not want anyone, anyone who really wants me.
sent.trans: 那些试图接近我的人，我一个都不想要。

sent.orig: Never make promise to anyone and never trust the promise that anyone makes to you.
sent.trans: 不针对任何人任何事做出任何承诺，并永不相信任何人对你所做出的承诺。

sent.orig: Nowhere in the world was there anyone to turn to, anyone to rely upon.
sent.trans: 世界上没有一个人可投靠，没有任何人可以依赖。

sent.orig: They pick with a dizzy finger anyone, just anyone.
sent.trans: 它们昏乱的指头会挑到任何人，任何人。
